eu.amidst.core.inference.messagepassing

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.inference.messagepassing.Node

  • public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines and handles a Node used for message passing inference algorithms.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a new Node given an input EF_ConditionalDistribution.
